title: [K-12] Climate Change Inquiry-Based Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and foundational awareness of climate change
context.additional_context: An educational program where pre-service teachers analyze region-based climate change data using mathematical tools.

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically visualize and interpret climate change data
Learners can establish climate change lesson plans by applying Inquiry-Based Learning (IBL) design principles
Learners can identify patterns in regional climate data and present predictive results through mathematical modeling

resources: Regional Climate Change Case Study Materials

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
